exec: pm.test("Yes, it was a capture Job", function() {

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<cms:captureJob xmlns:cms="http://capturemedia.fims.tv" xmlns:bms="http://base.fims.tv" xmlns:brio="http://brio.dalet.com" xmlns:tim="http://baseTime.fims.tv" xmlns:desc="http://description.fims.tv" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
   <bms:resourceID>{{$guid}}</bms:resourceID>
   <bms:startJob xsi:type="bms:StartJobByNoWaitType" />
   <profiles>
      <captureProfile>
         <transformAtom>
            <brio:brioCodec>
               <brio:codecName>MXF HD XDCAM 422</brio:codecName>
               <brio:wrapperType>mxf</brio:wrapperType>
               <brio:bitsRate>50000</brio:bitsRate>
               <brio:audioChannels>8</brio:audioChannels>
               <brio:audioBitsRate>24</brio:audioBitsRate>
            </brio:brioCodec>
         </transformAtom>
         <transferAtom>
            <bms:destination>V:\{{Recorder}}</bms:destination>
         </transferAtom>
         <outputFileNamePattern>{{FileNameA}}</outputFileNamePattern>
      </captureProfile>
   </profiles>
   <startProcess xsi:type="bms:StartProcessByTimeType">
      <bms:time>{{RecTime}}</bms:time>
   </startProcess>
   <stopProcess xsi:type="bms:StopProcessByDurationType">
      <bms:duration>
         <tim:timecode>{{Timecode}}</tim:timecode>
      </bms:duration>
   </stopProcess>
</cms:captureJob>

request.description:
Brio
Query to start a job a specific time with (StartProcessByTimeType)

</cms:captureJob>
